name: BetterWidget
overview: BetterWidget introduces new business ideas to the market. We infuse startups with the support they need to rapidly introduce new innovative products and services. We partner with leading venture capital firms and other strategic investors to provide the resources to maximize the potential of new companies, and we drive the branding, marketing, and sales initiatives of these companies throughout emerging global markets. As a highly creative innovator and organizer, BetterWidget turns business ideas into enduring companies.
